name: Personal Project Platformer
description:
This is a WIP project made for my Personal Project. It is a short 2D platformer, with 3 levels (as of right now). 

After you've played the game, feel free to provide feedback on things I can improve, on this form here. This would be really useful for my PP report, as I can comment on your ideas.

Link for feedback form.

(The game only takes a few minutes at most to play)

Some problems I've yet to address:

- No pause menu

- Can't quit game without finishing it (you have to alt tab and close the window)

- Background vibrates a little while moving due to camera code
